bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of a mild form of xie xie 泄瀉①, outflow, mentioned in the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 as a side effect following the intake of some pharmaceutical drugs. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry zhu rou 豬肉：肝，主脚氣，空心，切作生，以薑、醋進之，當微泄 , “The liver. It controls leg qi. To be consumed on an empty stomach. Cut and prepare raw. Ingest with ginger and vinegar. [Its intake may be] associated with mild outflow ”.
